name: Void Strife
description:
An Open-World Action game with branching storylines and quests.

In Void Strife, most quests or actions in the market can drastically change the outcome of the galaxy. One moment, it may be on its way to becoming a peaceful place, but one single misstep will cause massive calamity down the line.

The factions you can interact with will react to your and other factions' actions, meaning you could technically cause a war to break out between the space hippies Dynasty Roses and the power-hungry Frost Tips.

Ranging from rifles that shoot spheres emanating lightning tendrils to bionic laser eyes to the behemoth disruptor beams, you have to pick the right tool for the job.

Equip special equipment which gives you access to different skills, or equip the mythical artifacts, which tear you apart as you rip through enemies.

Explore an open-world top-down galaxy, filled with interesting NPCs and enemies to fight.

Can you find every scattered note log left behind by unhinged pilots?

Warning - The game is still heavily in development and many features/QoL will be missing and bugs galore. There is not a lot of content in the game just yet.
